links.*: Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"

wikitext.*:
On [[13 June|13]]-[[15 June]] [[1964]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to Mr W.R. Matthews'''.

* '''Descriptions:''' Tolkien made a carbon copy of the letter and included it in the manuscript folder containing ''Words, Phrases & Passages in ''The Lord of the Rings''. The letter contains a discussion of the [[Black Speech]].
* '''Publication:''' A large section of the letter was published in [[Parma Eldalamberon 17|''Parma Eldalamberon'', issue 17]].<ref>{{PE|17}}, pp. 11-12</ref>
{{references}}
